# Engine

A C++ Game Engine for academic purposes using SDL2.

## How to build

```sh
$ cd ${PROJECT_ROOT_DIR}
$ mkdir build
$ cd build
$ cmake ..
# At this point you should have either a Makefile or a Visual Studio project.
$ cmake --build .
# You should have an executable ready to run the game.
```
